subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Spieth completed a dream season by winning the Tour Championship and the FedEx Cup title to collect a $1.485 million check for the tournament and a $10 million bonus for the Cup victory.
snippet: Spieth completed a dream season by winning the Tour Championship and the FedEx Cup title to collect a $1.485 million check for the tournament and a $10 million bonus for the Cup victory.
